y coordinate to begin the cross
width of cross

briefdescription.para: Update GPS Status - Validate received gps data.

parameterdescription.para: Bit in order to print cross to indicate NOT STATUS

briefdescription.para: Update SD Card Status - Validate SD Card functioning.

parameterdescription.para: Bit in order to print cross to indicate NOT STATUS

briefdescription.para: Validate WIFI Status - Validate WiFi connection.

parameterdescription.para: Bit in order to print cross to indicate NOT STATUS

briefdescription.para: Update Number of Satellites that sends data to the GPS Sensor.

parameterdescription.para: Number of satellites reached by the GPS sensor

briefdescription.para: Update Number of Samples receveid by GPS sensor and stored.

parameterdescription.para: Number of samples stored in current process

briefdescription.para: Update timer to receive a new sample and analyze it.

parameterdescription.para: Time to next sample

briefdescription.para: Update and display the size of original trajectory file.

parameterdescription.para: Original Data File Size (MBs)

briefdescription.para: Update and display the size of compressed trajectory file.

parameterdescription.para: Compressed Data File Size (MBs)

briefdescription.para: Update Graphbox that shows if the system is storing data.

parameterdescription.para: Bit in order to set the Graph Box STATUS - ON/OFF

briefdescription.para: Update date information received from satellites.

parameterdescription.para: Current year data received from GPS sensor

Current day data received from GPS sensor

briefdescription.para: Update time information received from satellites.
